title: [Great Oak, Vine Bridge]
description: The bridge shudders slightly under the added weight, wobbles from side to side, but then becomes stable once again.  Branches reach out from the surrounding oaks, their leaf-covered fingers clutching at the bridge.  A circular clearing opens in the woods below, decaying stumps and withered foliage evident from this height.  A rank odor, like the heavy scent of muck or bog slime, rises from the clearing and wafts through the air.

The bridge shudders slightly under the added weight, wobbles from side to side, but then becomes stable once again. A rank odor, like the heavy scent of muck or bog slime, rises from the clearing and wafts through the air.
